name: Old Mara
description: A grizzled elder who remembers when the Brass Guild first settled here.

neutral: Nothing good grows from iron wombs.
Your grandfather knew better than to trust machines.
positive: The earth remembers your family's honor.
negative: I remember when your kin broke the contract.

name: Thaddeus Forgehand
description: Master smith of the Brass Guild. His hands are permanently stained with metal.

neutral: Show me your metal, and I'll show you your worth.
positive: Your family knows the value of good steel.
A Coalroot contract is one worth keeping.
negative: Trust broken once is trust broken forever.
Your ancestors left a stain on that name.

name: Elysium Wander
description: Nomadic trader who moves between settlements. Knows every secret road.

neutral: I've heard things about your bloodline.
positive: Your family has always been fair traders.
The roads remember your ancestors kindly.
negative: Your name carries weight—and not all of it good.
Some say your kin brought the bandits.

name: Elara Greenthumb
description: Keeper of the oldest biological knowledge. Her eyes see the past in every leaf.

neutral: The earth whispers its secrets to those who listen.
positive: Your family respects the old ways.
negative: Too much iron in the soil. Too much machine in the blood.
Your ancestors chose metal over life.

name: Captain Ironwill
description: Military commander of Rust Gate. His honor is unbreakable—but his memory is long.

neutral: Your bloodline's past actions determine your present welcome.
positive: A Coalroot oath is one I can trust.
Your family has proven its loyalty.
negative: Your grandfather broke a contract with the Brotherhood. That debt is yours now.

name: Tav the Tale-Teller
description: Wanderer who collects and spreads stories. Knows every rumor in the wasteland.

positive: Your family's reputation precedes you—in a good way.
The stories about your bloodline are honorable.
negative: The whispers aren't kind about your kin.
People talk. And they're not saying nice things.
